name: nefelion
description: My personal cloud, for self-tracking and visualizing myriad data types; includes interfaces for manual logging of some types.

associated.name: medusa
associated.description: State management for nefelion's interactive data visualizations.

associated.name: pegasus
associated.description: Data pre-processing for nefelion in a Web Worker.

name: dead on Everest
description: An experimental mobile-first visualization of Wikipedia's [list of all the people who have died climbing Mount Everest](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_people_who_died_climbing_Mount_Everest 'Wikipedia: List of people who died climbing Mount Everest') since the beginning of kept records on the subject.

associated.name: everest-data
associated.description: JSON representation (+ JSON Schema validation) of the Wikipedia data.

name: 20(16) in 2016
description: A code art "obstacle course" I've set myself in the year 2016. [Read more on the project website](http://janabeck.com/twenty-sixteen/about/ '20(16) in 2016: About').

name: steel-can coffee
description: An experimental responsive & interactive data visualization of the data from [Thrillist's cupping of grocery store coffees](https://www.thrillist.com/drink/nation/what-s-the-best-grocery-store-coffee-folgers-chock-full-onuts 'Thrillist: The Best Grocery Store Coffees').
